mapper.insert: insert into o2_review values ( review_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{content}, #{score}, #{thumb_nail}, sysdate, #{img_name}, #{h_num} )
mapper.select: SELECT AVG(score) as score FROM o2_review WHERE h_num = #{h_num} group by h_num
SELECT COUNT(avg(score)) FROM o2_review WHERE h_num = #{h_num} GROUP BY h_num
select count(*) from o2_user_pay where to_date(#{today}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') between to_date(#{checkin}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date(#{checkout}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and num = #{num}
select u.*, substr(img, 0, instr(img, ',')-1) as thumbnail, h.home_name, h.host_name from o2_user_pay u, o2_home h where u.h_num = h.num and u.num = #{num}
